title: First Missing Positive
question:
Given an unsorted integer array, find the smallest missing positive integer.

Example 1:

Input: [1,2,0]
Output: 3


Example 2:

Input: [3,4,-1,1]
Output: 2


Example 3:

Input: [7,8,9,11,12]
Output: 1


Note:

Your algorithm should run in O(n) time and uses constant extra space.
code: undefinedpublic class Solution {    public int FirstMissingPositive(int[] nums) {            }}
